Binary message at 4:20 AM:
01001000 01100001 01110000 01110000 01111001 00100000
01101110 01100101 01110111 00100000 01111001 01100101
01100001 01110010 00100001 00100000 01001101 01100001
01101011 01100101 00100000 01110100 01101000 01100101
00100000 01100010 01100101 01110011 01110100 00100000
01101111 01100110 00100000 01100101 01110110 01100101
01110010 01111001 01110100 01101000 01101001 01101110
01100111 00101110 00100000 01001111 01101000 00101100
00100000 01100001 01101110 01100100 00100000 01101000
01100101 01110010 01100101 00100111 01110011 00100000
01100001 00100000 00100010 01110100 01101001 01101110
01111001 00100000 01101000 01101001 01101110 01110100
00100010 00100000 00111100 00110011 00101110

This decodes to:
"Happy new year! Make the best of everything. Oh, and here's a "tiny hint" <3."

The dots pattern (., .., ..., ...., .....) is Morse code for "EISH5"
- E = .
- I = ..
- S = ...
- H = ....
- 5 = .....

This may indicate using the NUMBER of dots as a key or index.
